General.Name: Shanghai Jiaoda Onlly Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Jiaoda Onlly Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, and production of single probiotic food raw material and health products in China. The company offers functional health products, probiotics, traditional tonics, dietary supplements, and natural elements, as well as provides disinfection products. It also provides medical care services for the elderly with moderate to severe disability and dementia and the elderly after surgery. The company operates and manages 14 medical care institutions, including hospitals and nursing homes. Shanghai Jiaoda Onlly Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Shanghai, China.
